markdownRemark.html:
Learn to Program with Julia

Julia is a good choice to learn to program with, or else after learning python. Fortunately there are many open source Julia tutorials.

Intro to Programming

Topic Book
Think Julia: How to Think Like a Computer Scientist - Ben Lauwens and Allen Downey
“Julia language: a concise tutorial" - Antonello Lobianco
Learn Julia the Hard Way - Chris von Csefalvay
